titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow an above-the-line deduction for health insurance premiums.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow an above-the-line deduction for health insurance premiums.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an individual taxpayer a deduction from gross income of insurance premiums paid for the health care coverage of the taxpayer and the taxpayer's spouse and dependents. The bill makes the deduction available whether or not the taxpayer itemizes other deductions.
